verses.name: Matthew 12:30
verses.text: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad.

verses.name: Matthew 12:31
verses.text: Wherefore I say unto you, All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men: but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men.

verses.name: Matthew 12:32
verses.text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost, it shall not be forgiven him, neither in this world, neither in the world to come.
